task.title: Displaying an image for a video game in <canvas>
task.shortdesc: This document instructs on how to load and render an image in a video game.

context.p: To accomplish this goal you will need to:

li.xref: Have the <canvas> element and JavaScript file declared and called properly.

ul.li: Provide an image for the JavaScript to load.

li.xref: Write a function to render the image in the update loop.

substep.cmd: Write variables for a new image and a true / false state for when the image is ready.
Write an onload function that sets the true / false state to true.
Set a source for the Image() method.

step.cmd: Create and call the rendering function.

substep.cmd: Refer to the <canvas> drawing context in a drawImage method.

step.cmd: Call the rendering function within the update loop.
